channel.title: CVE Feed for StylemixThemes -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for StylemixThemes -- all products

item.title: CVE-2023-37385|2024-06-04T17:24:27.871Z -- stylemixthemes -- consulting
item.description: Improper Limitation of a Pathname to a Restricted Directory ('Path Traversal') vulnerability in StylemixThemes Consulting allows PHP Local File Inclusion.This issue affects Consulting: from n/a through 6.5.6.

item.title: CVE-2023-46207|2023-11-13T02:51:13.073Z -- stylemixthemes -- motors%20%E2%80%93%20car%20dealer%2C%20classifieds%20%26%20listing
item.description: Server-Side Request Forgery (SSRF) vulnerability in StylemixThemes Motors – Car Dealer, Classifieds & Listing.This issue affects Motors – Car Dealer, Classifieds & Listing: from n/a through 1.4.6.

item.title: CVE-2023-46208|2023-10-27T20:28:52.640Z -- stylemixthemes -- motors%20%E2%80%93%20car%20dealer%2C%20classifieds%20%26%20listing
item.description: Unauth. Reflected Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) vulnerability in StylemixThemes Motors – Car Dealer, Classifieds & Listing plugin <= 1.4.6 versions.

item.title: CVE-2023-35093|2023-06-22T11:07:21.020Z -- stylemixthemes -- masterstudy%20lms%20wordpress%20plugin%20%E2%80%93%20for%20online%20courses%20and%20education
item.description: Broken Access Control vulnerability in StylemixThemes MasterStudy LMS WordPress Plugin – for Online Courses and Education plugin <= 3.0.8 versions allows any logged-in users, such as subscribers to view the "Orders" of the plugin and get the data related to the order like email, username, and more.

item.title: CVE-2023-35090|2023-06-22T10:33:16.893Z -- stylemixthemes -- masterstudy%20lms%20wordpress%20plugin%20%E2%80%93%20for%20online%20courses%20and%20education
item.description: Auth. (contributor+) Stored Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) vulnerability in StylemixThemes MasterStudy LMS WordPress Plugin – for Online Courses and Education plugin <= 3.0.7 versions.

item.title: CVE-2023-50852|2023-12-28T11:30:57.071Z -- stylemixthemes -- booking%20calendar%20%7C%20appointment%20booking%20%7C%20bookit
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Special Elements used in an SQL Command ('SQL Injection') vulnerability in StylemixThemes Booking Calendar | Appointment Booking | BookIt.This issue affects Booking Calendar | Appointment Booking | BookIt: from n/a through 2.4.3.

item.title: CVE-2024-4789|2024-06-04T17:54:38.198Z -- stylemixthemes -- cost%20calculator%20builder%20pro
item.description: Cost Calculator Builder Pro plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Server-Side Request Forgery in all versions up to 3.1.72, via the send_demo_webhook() function. This makes it possible for authenticated attackers, with subscriber-level access and above, to make web requests to arbitrary locations originating from the web application and can be used to query and modify information from internal services.

item.title: CVE-2024-4097|2024-06-04T17:53:50.763Z -- stylemixthemes -- cost%20calculator%20builder
item.description: The Cost Calculator Builder plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Stored Cross-Site Scripting via the SVG upload feature in all versions up to, and including, 3.1.67 due to insufficient input sanitization and output escaping. This makes it possible for unauthenticated attackers to inject arbitrary web scripts in pages that will execute whenever a user accesses an injected page.

item.title: CVE-2024-35677|2024-06-11T14:44:54.534Z -- stylemixthemes -- megamenu
item.description: Improper Limitation of a Pathname to a Restricted Directory ('Path Traversal') vulnerability in StylemixThemes MegaMenu allows PHP Local File Inclusion.This issue affects MegaMenu: from n/a through 2.3.12.
